meanings.definition: A type of marine worm with bristles on its body.
meanings.sent1: The chaetopods wriggled in the sand, their bristles shining in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study chaetopods to learn more about marine ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The chaetopods had a party, each bristle dancing to the rhythm of the ocean waves.
meanings.sent4: The chaetopods stood out in the underwater world like tiny, colorful flags.
meanings.sent5: As the diver approached, the chaetopods swiftly burrowed into the sandy ocean floor.
